children.name: Test defects
Test timeout of 90000ms exceeded while running "beforeEach" hook.
Validate the full-width banner present below the page title which supports images and videos
Verify DPQ Navigation from the link and Logo with it at centre check
Test timeout of 90000ms exceeded.
Verify DPQ Navigation from the link - logged In User - submission success and unavailable
Verify DPQ Navigation from the link - logged In User - submission failure
MegaNav - Validate User is redirected to L3 when clicked on the hyperlink
MegaNav - Validate User is redirected to L2 when clicked on the hyperlink
Cart - Display Order Total - Verify that the order total is displayed to the right of the page title.
GPH-Sticky Header- Verify the header is sticky through the following pages: PDP
GPH-Mega Menu Navigation - Verify Mega Menu Navigation opens on hovering within the CTA and on selecting the subcategory it redirected to the corresponding PLP
GPH-Promotional Banner Managment - Verify the promotional banner should be displayed On Homepage
GPH-Sticky Header- Verify the header is sticky through the following pages: PDP
GPH-Mega Menu Navigation - Verify Mega Menu Navigation opens on hovering within the CTA
GPH-Account State Update - Verify the header update to display the logged-in user state, display of user's first name under the Account icon
Account - Addresses - Edit Address - Verify clicking on Edit against any address, application expands edit address form with values pre-populated in it.
Account - Payments - Verify navigation to payment page when click on Make payment button
New User Account - Saved Credit Cards - Verify display of message There are currently no credit cards saved to your account.

My Account Order details - Item Cancellation - Verify clicking on Cancel Item on, application opens a cancel item modal along with following options:- Yes, Cancel the product- No, Go back to the Order- X option

My Account Order details - Payment Section - Verify following details are shown along with Payment details: - Billing Address- First & Last Name- Address Line 1- Address Line 2 (if available)- City, State/Region & Zip Code- 10 digit phone - (XXX) XXX-XXXX format.
My Account Order details - Write a Product Review - Verify 'Write a Product Review' button is shown only if the order status is marked 'Delivered'.
My Account Order details - Write a Product Review - Verify clicking on the 'Write a Product Review' button, application opens a modal hosted from Power Reviews integration.
My Account Order details - Return/Refund Information - Verify display of return information in the Order Summary section.
My Account Order details - Return/Refund Information - Verify display of refund information in the Order Summary section.
My Account Order details - Display the Order Number under the Orders in Left Navigation - Verify the left navigation updates to Orders -> Order number when user is only any order's details page.
PDP - Display of Selected Variant Image - Verify that selected variant’s image is displayed  as full sized to the left
Test timeout of 270000ms exceeded.
Verify Billing Address edit section - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping section
Verify Billing Address edit section for Credit User - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping section
Verify PromoCode - Valid- for the loggedIn user - go to shipping scenario - check progress bar and return to cart
Test timeout of 120000ms exceeded.
Validate Navigation Arrows in PLP - Add to cart drawer
Validate Add To Cart Option in Choose Options drawer in PLP
Validate Quantity Option in Choose Options drawer in PLP
Product defects

Cart - Save Item for Later Functionality - Verify application following details against every line item:- Product Name- Item number- Total price- Thumbnail image of product or product variant added to the cart- When applicable: Color, Size, Width- Pricing- Quantity- Availability- Arrives by- Remove button (when applicable)- Personalization (when applicable)- Protection plan (when applicable).

Cart - Display Product Data - Verify application following details against every line item:- Product Name,Item number,Total price,Thumbnail image of product or product variant added to the cart- When applicable: Color, Size, Width- Pricing- Quantity- Availability- Arrives by- Remove button (when applicable)- Personalization (when applicable)- Protection plan (when applicable).
